ygData.subject: Re: Where does all that plat come from?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hee hee... Hate to break it to ya, but the places where you can begin to earn thousands, even hundreds of plat are well out of your level range. Keep
ygData.messageBody:
Hee hee...<br><br>Hate to break it to ya, but the
places where you can begin to earn thousands, even
hundreds of plat are well out of your level range. Keep
plodding along with the gear you've got.<br><br>Or, you
could spend all day, every day in EC, learning the
prices and getting an idea of what everything is worth.
I know more than one person who's made thousands of
plat before level 20 just by making damned good deals
in EC. You just have to know what you're buying and
selling, what it's worth, and what you can pay for
it.<br><br>Tyral Stormfang<br>Retired Ranger<br>Lanys T`Vyl
